name: Teuton Preinstalled Environment (TPE)

screenshots.caption: Blackbox Shell & ReactOS Taskmanager demonstrating MemUsage
The CleanIDE under TeutonPE (with happy headshot Theme)
OpenPE running eConsole running WineCMD xD & SoftSnoop
OpenPE running Code::Blocks, the OpenSource IDE

short_description: TeutonPE is inspired by PortableApps.com combined with a PeBuilder compiled Boot USB / CD. Programs can be used, even when there is no OS installed. BB4win is used for Live Menu and as the default Shell.All Plugins are also BartPE & XPE compatible
summary: Alternative PE to rescue, hack or troubleshoot your machine or network
